pain.t.fx_2021

Class ToolBarManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • pain.t.fx_2021.ToolBarManager

  • public class ToolBarManager
extends java.lang.Object

    Event Handlers for drawing tools

    Implementation of event handlers for ToolBarPain tools. Variables primarily cover pathing such as starting and current position. Some variables are defaults for drawing functionality. Relies heavily on passing data to GraphicsContext methods.
    Since:
    2021-10-16

      ToolBarManager()

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void drawCircle()
      Calls DrawMath.mathCircle to determine inputs for fillOcal and strokeOval methods.
      static void drawCutPasteRectangle()
      Draws a temporary rectangle to indicate what section was cut
      static void drawEllipse()
      Calls DrawMath.mathRectangle to determine inputs for fillOcal and strokeOval methods.
      static void drawPolygon()
      Calls DrawMath.mathPolygon to determine inputs for fillPolygon and strokePolygon methods.
      static void drawRectangle()
      Calls DrawMath.mathRectangle to determine inputs for fillRect and strokeRect methods.
      static void drawSquare()
      Uses formulas to determine inputs for fillRect and strokeRect methods.
      static void drawStraightLine()
      Calls strokeLine with position data to draw on GraphicsContext Checks whether it should just draw on previewContext Needs to re-add event handlers if copyCanvas is called because it makes a new previewCanvas
      static void drawTool()
      Selects relevant draw method based on current tool name Resets preview Canvas

      • toolBarManager

        public static void toolBarManager(java.lang.String x,
                                  TabPain selectedTabPass,
                                  javafx.scene.control.TabPane tabPanePass,
                                  ToolBarPain toolBarPass)
        Constructor for ToolBarManager. Primarily removes and adds event handlers from the canvas of the selected tab
        Parameters:
        x - String with name of tool selected by user
        selectedTabPass - TabPain that is being modified
        tabPanePass - TabPane parent of current TabPain
        toolBarPass - ToolBarPain

      • drawTool

        public static void drawTool()
        Selects relevant draw method based on current tool name Resets preview Canvas

      • drawCircle

        public static void drawCircle()
        Calls DrawMath.mathCircle to determine inputs for fillOcal and strokeOval methods. Checks whether it should just draw on previewContext Needs to re-add event handlers if copyCanvas is called because it makes a new previewCanvas

      • drawEllipse

        public static void drawEllipse()
        Calls DrawMath.mathRectangle to determine inputs for fillOcal and strokeOval methods. Checks whether it should just draw on previewContext Needs to re-add event handlers if copyCanvas is called because it makes a new previewCanvas

      • drawSquare

        public static void drawSquare()
        Uses formulas to determine inputs for fillRect and strokeRect methods. Checks whether it should just draw on previewContext Needs to re-add event handlers if copyCanvas is called because it makes a new previewCanvas

        public static void drawRectangle()
        Calls DrawMath.mathRectangle to determine inputs for fillRect and strokeRect methods. Checks whether it should just draw on previewContext Needs to re-add event handlers if copyCanvas is called because it makes a new previewCanvas

      • drawPolygon

        public static void drawPolygon()
        Calls DrawMath.mathPolygon to determine inputs for fillPolygon and strokePolygon methods. Checks whether it should just draw on previewContext Needs to re-add event handlers if copyCanvas is called because it makes a new previewCanvas

        public static void drawStraightLine()
